message.subject: New topic notification - "http://www.testohub.com/paltrox-rx/"
message.body:
Hello acrombies,

You are receiving this notification because you are watching the forum
"Rainmeter News" at "Rainmeter Forums". This forum has received a new topic
by ChoeWinsen since your last visit, "http://www.testohub.com/paltrox-rx/".
